item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 22, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PyTorch Internals: Ezyang's Blog (95 points | 6 comments)
2. Show HN: FastOpenAPI – automated docs for many Python frameworks (62 points | 34 comments)
3. Landrun: Sandbox any Linux process using Landlock, no root or containers (69 points | 17 comments)
4. Understanding R1-Zero-Like Training: A Critical Perspective (47 points | 2 comments)
5. Paul A. M. Dirac, Interview by Friedrich Hund (1982) [video] (19 points | 1 comment)
6. Differential Geometry: A First Course in Curves and Surfaces [pdf] (35 points | 1 comment)
7. Monster Cables picked the wrong guy to threaten (2008) (452 points | 142 comments)
8. Crabtime: Zig’s Comptime in Rust (335 points | 77 comments)
9. Facebook to stop targeting ads at UK woman after legal fight (28 points | 11 comments)
10. Locks, leases, fencing tokens, FizzBee (24 points | 4 comments)
11. Scallop – A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming (153 points | 41 comments)
12. Hubble Captures Vivid Auroras in Jupiter's Atmosphere (4 points | discuss)
13. Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning (2022) (365 points | 48 comments)
14. When you deleted /lib on Linux while still connected via SSH (2022) (70 points | 24 comments)
15. Amazon wants a product safety regulator declared unconstitutional (74 points | 48 comments)
16. The Cybernetic Teammate (12 points | 4 comments)
17. Blue Ghost lander captures sunset shots on moon before falling silent (26 points | 1 comment)
18. IETF setting standards for AI preferences (9 points | 2 comments)
19. IronRDP: a Rust implementation of Microsoft's RDP protocol (488 points | 199 comments)
20. Cake is watching you: I built a camera cake (41 points | 13 comments)
21. Use Long Options in Scripts (214 points | 114 comments)
22. France rejects backdoor mandate (876 points | 252 comments)
23. Global population datasets underrepresent rural population (200 points | 75 comments)
24. ‘Bluey’s World’: How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a Juggernaut (311 points | 270 comments)
25. Frink (169 points | 29 comments)
26. Don't Be Afraid of Types (78 points | 130 comments)
27. The New Three-Tier Application (54 points | 45 comments)
28. Career Development: What It Means to Be a Manager, Director, or VP (2015) (500 points | 226 comments)
29. Liberapay (322 points | 77 comments)
30. Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring Product Engineers ( | hide)
